name: Eloquii Design, Inc.
description: Provider of an online platform intended to offer trendy plus size fashion. The company's e-commerce platform offers contemporary fast fashion, with everything from dresses to outerwear to shoes, in sizes 14 to 28 and offers customers access to unique content through its Style & Substance blog and curated catalog, enabling plus-size women to dress and participate in fashion.
